current_opportunities.name: Warehouse Management Optimization
current_opportunities.description: The Small Warehouse I manage has zero wages set, which is causing employee dissatisfaction. Setting appropriate wages will improve productivity and strengthen my relationship with the Consiglio Dei Dieci.
